section.title: dpdk-devices devices
section.para: The devices configuration object within dpdk-devices has the following attributes:

row.entry: The name of a network device to be used with DPDK. The device names must be the logical-name specified by the nic-mapping (see ).

entry.para: Defines the userspace I/O driver to be used for network devices where the native device driver does not provide userspace I/O capabilities.
